name: Yotsubahou Reiiden ~ Crisis of Western Oriental Land
name_original: Yotsubahou Reiiden ~ Crisis of Western Oriental Land
description:
November 7th 2018 - On that day, on a certain image board, a certain moderator made a certain crucial mistake: He tripped over the power cord to the site's hyper cyber security prison, letting all the site's greatest enemies run free. It is now up to the certain moderator yournamehere (/ck/) and his colleagues kinomod (/a/) and Aerolite to round up all the villains, as well as save the site from a threat greater than they could have ever anticipated.

This is easily one of the dumbest game ideas I've had, so I couldn't resist making it a reality. I always kinda disliked setting shmups in space, so this seemed like a nice different thing. Additionally, Touhou Hagurumaden was a Touhou fangame storywise, but I wanted to make a gameplay tribute too. And finally, I wanted a -hou series (though I doubt I will ever make a sequel).  Thanks for trying it out (but please don't play the extra stage before clearing the main story, that's illegal)!

Controls for Windows/Web:

  • Movement - Arrow keys
  • Shoot/ Advance text/Select - A
  • Bomb / Skip Text - S
  •  Focus (move slower + see hitbox) - D
  • Skip warning screen - Enter
  • Full screen: CTRL + Enter for Windows / Button for Web
  • Open&Close Pause Menu / Exit from title screen - Escape

Additional notes:

  • Original release date: 07/02/19
  • This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events, locales, and incidents are either the products of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
  • It's made with prism, but there's too many bullets on screen, so don't expect a dreamcast port for this one (there's even windows slowdown here, we're reaching levels of slow previously unimaginable).
  • Source code is on github: http://github.com/CaptainDreamcast/Yotsubahou/

Thanks for playing!
